assessment_item.title: ಜೀವ ವಿಜ್ಞಾನ ತಂತ್ರಜ್ಞಾನದ ‘ಬಯೋಕಾನ್ ನಿಗಮ’ದ ಅಧ್ಯಕ್ಷರು

ಜೀವ ವಿಜ್ಞಾನ ತಂತ್ರಜ್ಞಾನದ ‘ಬಯೋಕಾನ್ ನಿಗಮ’ದ ಅಧ್ಯಕ್ಷರು

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":""},"options":[{"text":"

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:5799"},{"text":"

ನಾರಾಯಣ ಮೂರ್ತಿ

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:5800"},{"text":"

ಧೀರು ಭಾಯಿ ಅಂಬಾನಿ

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:5810"},{"text":"

ಕಿರಣ್ ಮುಜಮ್‍ದಾರ್ ಷಾ
